main event: A bright, oval-shaped object with a reddish-orange glow was sighted in the sky over Oradell, New Jersey on September 8, 1962.
interesting points: The object appeared to change direction rapidly and make sudden stops and starts.
The object was estimated to be approximately 1000 feet in altitude and several miles away.
The object accelerated rapidly and disappeared from view after several minutes of observation.
No sound was associated with the object.
The witness did not take any photographs of the object.
sighted object: bright, oval-shaped object with a reddish-orange glow
witnesses: single witness, a resident of Oradell, New Jersey
